## CourseStructureJSON class

Static class to retrieve the course structure of a specific user

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default class CourseStructreJSON 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getUserCourseStrucuture(userId, relations)](./clm-ext-learning_objects.coursestructurejson.getusercoursestrucuture.md) | <code>static</code> | Get the course-structure of the user as JS/JSON by aggregating the user permission of the user to learning objects, lrss, groups (roles of groups). |
|  [getUserTool(userId, toolId)](./clm-ext-learning_objects.coursestructurejson.getusertool.md) | <code>static</code> | Gets the tool by user- and tool-id |
